full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Supply and Delivery of Automated DNA and RNA Sample Quality Control Instrument
#### Solicitation Number: 30005110

**Important Information:** This tender is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI only. Suppliers must be pre-qualified for the required category and associated services.

**Requirements:** The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Gulf Fisheries Center in Moncton, NB, requires the supply and delivery of an automated DNA and RNA sample quality control (QC) instrument. The contract must include installation, instrument familiarization, and all required software.

**Delivery Point:** The delivery point is:
Associé au « Fisheries and Oceans Canada »  
Association Fédérale fraîcheurs dunders Jordan François!
 399 Clayton Burger
Moncton, N-B
B6A CH08

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is not subject to any trade agreements.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No

**Supplier Requirements:**

* Suppliers must be pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for the said category.
* Suppliers must be familiar with the provided solicitation documents through CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba), including the request for Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI/D.

**Evaluation Criteria:** The contract will be awarded to the lowest price bidder.

**Closing Date:** The official closing date for this tender was on February 14, 2024, at 2:00 PM AST.

**Attachments:** A copy of this tender notice can be found in attachments at the following links:
* English: [Link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28738/30005110---npp_en.pdf)
* French: [Link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28738/30005110---npp_fr.pdf)

**Contact Information:**
Marie-France Chrétien  
marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or 450521-4448.
